Key Match Events: Jamal Musiala scored the opening goal for Germany
Florian Wirtz scored the second goal for Germany
Ryan Porteous was sent off for a horror tackle on Ilkay Gundogan
Niclas Füllkrug scored the third goal for Germany
Antonio Rudiger scored an own goal for Scotland
Emre Can scored the fifth goal for Germany in injury time
Post-Match Reflections: The future is now with Musiala and Wirtz
Toni Kroos was outstanding in the match
Ryan Porteous' red card was a turning point in the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Germany taught Scotland a footballing lesson
Scotland fans had travelled to support their side in Bavaria
Scotland conceded again via a thumping effort from Niclas Füllkrug and an injury time goal from Emre Can
Others: The second half was not quite as nightmarish for Steve Clarke’s side
An Antonio Rudiger own goal gave the Scottish fans at least a modicum of joy from a tough evening
